paper_abstract: In this paper, we consider a multi-species Lotka-Volterra type competitive system with delays and feedback controls. A general criteria on the permanence is established, which is described by integral form and independent of feedback controls. By constructing suitable Lyapunov functionals, a set of easily verifiable sufficient conditions are derived for global stability of any positive solution to the model. (C) 2008 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Permanence and stability in multi-species non-autonomous Lotka-Volterra competitive systems with delays and feedback controls
